subject: Football
lead_paragraph: FOXBOROUGH, Mass., Jan. 17 — New England Coach Bill Belichick is apparently worried about getting to the Super Bowl again, not about LaDainian Tomlinson’s feelings.
snippet: FOXBOROUGH, Mass., Jan. 17 — New England Coach Bill Belichick is apparently worried about getting to the Super Bowl again, not about LaDainian Tomlinson’s feelings.
